overview:
Jordan has worked as a senior developer and consultant for the Internet and banking communities over the past 11 years. Jordan gained valuable experience in what it takes to make a new venture successful working for start- ups such as blackstar.co.uk, freeserve.com and betfair.com. More recently, Jordan has been providing technical consulting services to financial services companies including City Index and The Royal Bank of Scotland, enabling them to develop real-time trading applications.

In 2010, together with Heath Kane, he developed Odelay.
